util

Class Triplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Triplet

  • public class Triplet
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a Person, a Weapon, and a Room. This makes up a guess or a suggestion towards resolving the murder.
    Author:
    Aden Kenny and Simon Pope.

    • Method Detail

      • checkCards

        public Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String> checkCards(java.util.List<Player> players)
        Checks the player's card to see if they can refute a guess.
        Parameters:
        players - - The set of players in the game.
        Returns:
        A string representing the outcome of the refutation.

      • equalsTriplet

        public boolean equalsTriplet(Triplet other)
        Checks to see if the contents of one triplet equals another.
        Parameters:
        other - - The triplet to compare this to.
        Returns:
        True or false based on the contents of the two triplets.

      • containsPlayer

        public boolean containsPlayer(Player player)
        Checks to see if a player's hand contains any of the cards in this triplet. Used to check if a player suggests a card that is in his hand.
        Parameters:
        player - - The player who's hand will be checked.
        Returns:
        Boolean based on if the player holds a card in this triplet.
